original_text: The Lord will make you very ill so that you do not get better again. He will completely remove you from the land that you are now going into.
korean_text: 여호와께서 네 몸에 염병이 들게 하사 네가 들어가 차지할 땅에서 마침내 너를 멸하실 것이며
